TopicTitle: How do you turn off Passive Milestones in 1.0.5

Articles.Content:
The thread title is pretty self-explanatory. I'm curious on how to disable Milestones from KSP 1.0.5. I'm trying to play with FlowerChild's BTSM mod and that's a huge wrench thrower in the mod. Any help would be appreciated.

Edited November 14, 2015 by Daelkyr

Do you want to disable them entirely or disable the rewards? In GameData\Squad\Contracts\Contracts.cfg head down to the "Progression" section. Setting "PassiveBaseRatio" to zero should disable passive progress rewards. You will still be notified of them happening, you just will not get anything for it.
That was a quick answer. Thanks, it should meet my needs. I've been playing a 1.0.5 stock career and loving it, but wanted to try this one out.
So after setting passive to zero, they don't even pop up. Just a heads up on that.
